name: Flugi
description: Join Flugi, a young and brave mouse, on an exciting adventure to save his family and defeat the evil sorcerer Spark. Navigate through challenging levels filled with traps and puzzles, using your wits and skills to overcome obstacles and enemies. With the help of your trusty companion Mr. Whiskers and clues hidden throughout the game, explore the enchanted world of Flylandia and uncover its secrets. Will you be able to save Flugi's family and restore peace to the land?
